name: HEROINE
description:
Start with this role revealed.

Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses and Extra Bosses.

Plot Armor: You have +1 max life and +1 max hand size.

name: RIVAL
description:
Goal: Defeat the Heroine, then defeat all Stage Bosses and Extra Bosses.

Special: The game does not end the first time the Heroine is defeated. When the Heroine is defeated, reveal this role, take Heroine role card, and gain 1 life.

name: PARTNER
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses and the Extra Boss. Protect the Heroine.

Shared Fate: When you are defeated, the Heroine must discard all Item cards in play, then choose up to two cards in her hand and discard the rest.

name: PARTNER
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses and the Extra Boss. Protect the Heroine.

Shared Fate: When you are defeated, the Heroine must discard all Item cards in play, then choose up to two cards in her hand and discard the rest.

title: PARTNER / EXTRA BOSS
name: EX MIDBOSS
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Special: If the Extra Boss is defeated, reveal this card. You count as both an Extra Boss and a Partner for other playersâ€™ goals.

title: PARTNER
name: ONE TRUE PARTNER
description:
Goal: Defeat all other Partners, Stage Bosses and the Extra Boss. Protect the Heroine.

Shared Fate: When you are defeated, the Heroine must discard all Item cards in play, then choose up to two cards in her hand and discard the rest.

name: STAGE BOSS
description: Goal: Defeat the Heroine.

name: STAGE BOSS
description: Goal: Defeat the Heroine.

name: STAGE BOSS
description: Goal: Defeat the Heroine.

title: STAGE BOSS
name: FINAL BOSS
description: Goal: Defeat the Heroine after at least one Partner has been defeated.

title: STAGE BOSS
name: CHALLENGER
description: Goal: Defeat the Heroine after the Extra Boss has been defeated.

title: STAGE BOSS
name: ANTI-HEROINE
description: Goal: Defeat the Heroine after at least one other Stage Boss has been defeated.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: EX BOSS
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

True Form: At any time, if at least one other player has been defeated, you may reveal this role. If you do, replace it with the EX Boss Revealed role card and gain 1 life.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: EX BOSS REVEALED
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Final Form: You have +1 max life and +1 max hand size. Draw an extra card during your draw step.

True Form: At any time, if at least one other player has been defeated, you may reveal this role. If you do, replace it with the EX Boss Revealed role card and gain 1 life.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: PHANTASM BOSS
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Sinister Plan: At any time, if at least one other player has been defeated, you may reveal this role. If you do, replace it with the True Phantasm Boss role card and gain 1 life.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: TRUE PHANTASM BOSS
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Mastermind: You have +1 max life.
At the start of your turn you may resolve the current incident. If you do, look at the top three cards of the Incident deck and put them on the top or bottom in any order. Then,
skip your Incident step this turn.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: SECRET BOSS
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Secret Plan: At any time, if at least one other player has been defeated, you may reveal this role. If you do, replace it with the Secret Boss Discovered role card and gain 1 life.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: SECRET BOSS DISCOVERED
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Hidden Power: You have +1 max life.
During your draw step, you may draw one card from the Lunatic deck instead of the Main deck.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: LONE WOLF
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Tag In: At any time, if at least one other player has been defeated, you may reveal this role. If you do, replace it with the Tag Team role card and gain 1 life.

title: EXTRA BOSS
name: TAG TEAM
description:
Goal: Defeat all Stage Bosses, then defeat the Heroine.

Double Threat: You have +1 max life.
When you gain this role, recruit an Extra Character. If you lose this role, dismiss that Extra Character.
